title: Best of The Herd for Mar 19, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 19, 2020
description:
Colin would be much higher on Joe Burrow if the Dolphins traded up for him

Belichick had no reason not to see Brady's departure coming

Cowboys and Rams are following a flawed business model

Tom Brady might want a looser culture than New England's


Guests: Peter Schrager, FOX NFL Analyst

Dr. Drew Pinsky, Internist TV/Radio Host
